law.text:
A political subdivision of this State that, at any time, has the power to impose and collect a gross receipts tax may not thereby be construed to have the power to impose and may not impose a gross receipts tax on the gross receipts of any person that are received from a sale of:
Space used for advertising:
In any newspapers, magazines, periodicals, programs, directories, and other printed matter published in this State; or
On any billboard, structure, vehicle, or airborne device located in this State; or
Time used for advertising on or in connection with any radio or television broadcast originating in this State.
